en: Aquatic centre with 2 wave pools, giant slide, beach, solarium, waterfalls, whirlpools, rapid river. The outdoor pools, the Tropic'Gliss and the green areas are waiting for you in the "Aquatic Area". You can also sign up for the daily Aquagym class. Tropic'GlissFor thrills it is with the Tropic'Gliss that you can mix adrenaline and freshness‚úî Every day from 11:30am to 1pm and from 4pm to 6pm.üö© Attraction forbidden to under 8 years old- Supervision will be provided at the start of the stairs.- Hydro alcoholic gel is provided at the start of the stairs.- Only one person at a time on the slide, the next one leaving only at the arrival of the previous.- The reception pool must be evacuated immediately by the customer - Social distancing must be respected in the queue - The supervisor reminds if necessary the rules of social distancing in the queue which are also posted - The slide will be disinfected before the opening of public slots by the staff (10:30 and 14:30). On the fitness side, the weight room is available to subscribers. You can also sign up for one of the two daily fitness sessions. All the details are in your "Espace forme" section.a sports coach is always present in the room during each session.he ensures that the sanitary rules are respected (physical distance, barrier gestures) and disinfects the machines between each use.the use of the showers and changing rooms is forbidden, the lockers are closed.the wearing of a mask is not obligatory during the practice of sports.as a subscriber, you can also, on a different time slot and after reservation, access the outdoor pools.

en:
Aquatic centre with 2 wave pools, giant slide, beach, solarium, waterfalls, bubbling baths, rapid river, outdoor pools, Tropic'Gliss and green areas await you in the "Aquatic area".
You can also sign up for the daily Aquagym class.
Tropic'Gliss
For strong sensations it is with the Tropic'Gliss that you can mix adrenaline and freshness
‚úî Every day from 11:30am to 1pm and from 4pm to 6pm.
üö© Attraction forbidden to children under 8 years old
- Supervision will be provided at the start of the staircase.
- Hydro-alcohol gel is provided at the start of the staircase.
- Only one person at a time on the slide, with the next person leaving only when the previous person arrives.
- The landing pool must be evacuated immediately by the client.
- Social distance must be maintained in the queue.
- The supervisor will remind the customer of the rules of social distancing in the queue, which are also posted.
- The slide will be disinfected before the opening of the public slots by the staff (10:30 and 14:30).

On the fitness side, the weight room is available to subscribers. You can also sign up for one of the two daily fitness sessions
All the details in your "Espace forme" section.
A sports coach is always present in the gym during each session.
The trainer ensures that health rules are respected (physical distance, barrier gestures) and that the machines are disinfected between each use.

The use of showers and changing rooms is forbidden and lockers are closed.
Wearing a mask is not compulsory during the sport.

As a subscriber, you can also, on a different time slot and after booking, access the outdoor pools.

- La surveillance sera assur√©e au d√©part de l‚Äôescalier.
- Du gel hydro alcoolique est fourni au d√©part de l‚Äôescalier.
- Une seule personne √† la fois sur le toboggan, la suivante partant uniquement √† l‚Äôarriv√©e de la pr√©c√©dente.
- Le bassin de r√©ception doit √™tre √©vacu√© imm√©diatement par le client.
- La distanciation sociale doit √™tre respect√©e dans la file d‚Äôattente.
- Le surveillant rappelle le cas √©ch√©ant les r√®gles de distanciation sociale dans la file d‚Äôattente qui sont par ailleurs affich√©es.
- Le toboggan sera d√©sinfect√© avant l‚Äô ouverture des cr√©neaux publics par le personnel ( 10h30 et 14h30).

C√¥t√© Forme, la salle de musculation est √† disposition des abonn√©s. Vous pouvez √©galement vous inscrire √† l‚Äôune des deux s√©ances quotidiennes de fitness. 
Tous les d√©tails dans votre rubrique ¬´ Espace forme ¬ª.
Pr√©sence en continue d‚Äôun coach sportif au sein de la salle lors de chaque cr√©neau.
Ce dernier veille au respect des r√®gles sanitaires (distanciation physique, gestes barri√®res) assure la d√©sinfection des machines entre chaque utilisation.

L‚Äôutilisation des douches, des vestiaires est interdite, les casiers sont ferm√©s.
Le port du masque n‚Äôest pas obligatoire durant la pratique sportive.

En tant qu'abonn√©, vous pouvez √©galement, sur un cr√©neau horaire diff√©rent et apr√®s r√©servation acc√©der aux bassins ext√©rieurs.
